content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I  was with my family and then my wife said what  is that lighting up red on the bottom of the kite i said thats  not a kite and then i a look at it and crab my phone and then i video tape it with my phone and it was  hovered for 5 min during a thunder storm it was triangular black object 5 witnesses it was great i'm a believer  i was a kid iv seen it before and my  family i have video to prove it let me know if anyone wants t see on youtube  it is ..Ufo sambam ..Thank u in enjoy
content.summary: It was during a thunderstorm and lighting

content.detailedDescription:
One mothership with cigar apareance plus 5 objects near mothership, faraway up to skyline caught from our security camera with movement detector.
you can see clearin the photo , but in video only appear as a flash during one second in the second number two of the film.
content.summary: Caught from our "revelacion ovni" security camera

content.detailedDescription: I was in my friends car coming home from going out to eat. we took a country road out close to where i live, she asked me if i would help her find an old friends house from 20+ years ago.As she did not live in this area anymore and forgotten the area. i agreed so on the way home to my right out the  car window which was rolled down i see a starlike obect appear non moving in any sort of direction , brighten for about 5 secs in awe i place my hand on my friends shoulder while checking the rearview mirror to make sure no one is behind us (because i was about to ask her to pull over) so that she could also see it, and just as she turned her head to me to see what i wanted it faded away.I began crying and told her i seen a star. i felt emotional that it was gone and like she did not believe me. i wanted to badly for her to see it also.This occured aprox between 545 - 620 pm march 27th
content.summary: Riding in car to my right i observed star like object appear motionless it brightened about 5 secs in daytime then faded in the same exact spot.

content.detailedDescription: I don't smoke in my home,so i'm often outside observing the night sky. i live about a mile west of soulsbyville, ca. this the first time i've decided to report this but not my first observation of this strange anomaly. i've been seeing this for quite some time. i have seen satellites fly over with the naked eye many times which is why this is not what i'm seeing. when i look in the sky to the east i'm seeing a light and occasionally multiple lights approximately the size of satellites making extreme movements in direction up down left and right. tonight i went back in the house to turn off the porch light for better viewing but when i returned i couldn't spot it again. having worked at a national laboratory i know what we are capable of and would not make a report like this if i thought it to be something man made. these anomalies are moving in a way that defies logic in human terms. i will attempt to film them when i see them again which is more frequent than i first thought.
content.summary: Very small satellite size light making extremely fast directional changes and stationary movements. i observed it for at least five minutes.

content.detailedDescription: Went out for a smoke and looked up because it is a crystal clear tonight, you can see all stars, looking towards the east i saw a wide bright red light, flashing intermittently, thought it was a plane heading west to the airport but it had no sound whatsoever and was flying very smooth and low. planes pass by apartment complex everyday and i can tell this was no ordinary commercial aircraft, couple of planes actually went by tonight and i heard their engines and descent. this object was just pure silent, hovered at a steady speed in the most smooth way i've ever witnessed ever in my life, without the light it must be totally stealth and impossible to see. i took several pictures with my iphone and upon zooming in, an disc shape with an upper center deck can be seen. whatever it was, it was so silent and smooth it literately freaked me out. i am familiar with planes and their beacons and lights arrangements in fuselage, wings, etc. this object's red light, more like a beam, was far bigger and wider than any commercial airliner and was positioned in the front fascia of the object as if it was "scanning" the land area from above. i lost sight of the object when it went over my roof.
content.summary: Fast, smooth, silent, vigilant

content.detailedDescription: Letting my dog out the slider door that evening, i saw an orb, turning in the sky heading for a cloud arm.When it turned, i saw what looked like the back of the orb, and looked like a jet fighters after burner. that, i herd! and it went into the cloud arm, and did not come through the other side, i thought that was strange!/ went back inside. so, after bout 15 min, i let the dog back in, and saw an other orb, same description, but it was hovering and moving up and down, (as you will see in the video that i took!) so i ran back in the door and grabbed my phone and recorded! after witnessing over 7 ufo account's this was my first recording of my experiences.
content.summary: Let the dog out the slider door, and saw a orb, hovering and turning towards a cloud, and went into it!  let the dog in, and another! or same one but 15 min later

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were in the backyard and we both were looking for shooting stars when we both saw what we thought at first was a flock of birds, then the object changes direction and shot off to the side.  the object had no noise, was almost transparent with some white, no lights, no noise.  almost like the sky above was projected on the bottom.  i had seen 3 of the same triangle shaped objects one night a month or two ago but thought, no i must of just seen something wrong and it was for a few seconds and went behind trees where i could not see anymore.  this time my wife was sitting right next to me so i knew we were both seeing it , she estimated 7-10 seconds that we saw it.  it is hard to describe, triangle shape, low to the ground under 1000 feet, almost transparent.
content.summary: Ufo appeared transparent was dusk, but could see outline

content.detailedDescription: Saw this orb of light pretty amazing
content.summary: Amazing

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Second story residence in main bedroom with large windows i observed a very bright brilliant flashing white strobe light object with 2 lights on either end of the cylinder. it was randomly flashing strobe white light at various speeds and no pattern to the flashing.  it was moving slowly approx 1000ft above the ground moving slowly nw to nose hill park in calgary, alberta, canada, then after 30mins it abruptly turned and moved s to sw for another 15 min still flashing random strobe lights till it came to a point right under the cloud layers then moved straight up and disappeared.  have video having tough time to download
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Strobe like object flashing strob bright white lights traveling nw then turned sw hovered and went through cloud celling to disappear

content.detailedDescription: Around mid september 2015 around 10 pm my girlfriend and i were in a boat fishing the ausable river mouth area when i observed two very bright what i believed to be stars.  i mentioned to my girlfriend that i have never noticed those two stars before as i observe the skies often.  i was quite taken by them and would look at them often for about 10 minutes when i noticed one of them started to move off towards the east.  i was shocked and pointed the event out to my girlfriend who was also stunned and surprised.  after about two minutes the second object also departed in the exact same direction.  seemed to accelerate out of sight within a minute or a minute and a half. we have never observed the objects again.
content.summary: Two spheres hovering then depart

content.detailedDescription: At 8.30 pm tonight took out some garbage.Looking up at night sky.Not yet total dark.Saw the light ball moving silent and incediblely fast,not a satellite as i know they are not that bright and now where that fast to cross the sky.It was maybe 40 seconds to travell from when i looked up to when it was gone.Was a full light-white.What got me was the speed.No shooting star.
content.summary: White ball travelling at incredible speed straight as an arrow.Brightness of light was consistant

content.detailedDescription: Driving towards the village commons in south hadley, my friend and i could see two bright lights in the sky that kind of looked like head lights. they were just sitting in the same spot for a very long time. we could see them about a half a mile away. as we got towards the center of the village commons, it looked as though the ufo was now over us. the two lights that we had previously seen turned into three very bright lights. as we were freaking out i had climbed into the backseat of the car and stuck my head out the window. i could see the three very bright lights in a triangle shape and as i was looking at them, i could make out the circular shape of the craft. it looked very low and gigantic. not long after it just sat above us and hovered, it started to move very fast and get far away. at this point, i needed to head home but my friend who witnessed it with me, continued to search for it after i left. she found it again on 202 in south hadley and followed it all the way to memorial drive in chicopee. she called me freaking out saying how close she was to it and that she was going to pul over to try and capture a picture. as soon as she parked, she said she was underneath it like we were before, and then the phone started to act up. i started to lose her and eventually our call dropped. she called me back freaking out telling me she captured pictures and a video. i strongly believe that i saw a ufo tonight. you can watch the video and decide for yourself whether or not you believe my story.
content.summary: Two bright lights turning into three when underneath it- able to see circular outline of craft when underneath it as well

content.detailedDescription:
I first witnessed this phenomenon during the lunar eclipse on september 27th, 2015 around 9:00 pm central time. my wife and i were watching the "blood moon” together. a short time passed when i started to look at the mostly clear night sky around the moon for constellations, single stars, high-flyers and satellites. after a few minutes of looking, i saw what i thought was a satellite. it was traveling normally, satellite-like, from ssw to the nne at a steady rate of speed. it passed under the full lunar eclipse event which was occurring ese at approximately 50 to 60 degrees above the se horizon. suddenly the object curved in a fairly large arc to the right and began going east at a very high rate of speed till it disappeared. my wife's eye sight is not very good and the object was too dim for her to see but i was able to describe to her what was going on. satellites don't turn or curve so my first impression was that it was an extremely high-flyer, likely to be a military jet too far away to hear. the next day i told one of my co-workers what i had seen, telling him that it was unlike anything i had seen before as an adult.

on march 27th, last easter night around 9:10 pm, that september 27th 2015 sighting was no longer a "one of" event. my wife and i had just returned home from spending easter sunday with our daughter and grandson. i had just finished unloading the mini-van and i looked up to enjoy the clear sky and the many stars. the moon had not risen yet, so the brightest object was one of the planets. i think it is jupiter situated about 55 to 60 degrees above the western horizon in the sw part of the sky. both orion and the big dipper were also prominent in their proper locations. i was looking nearly due south about 40 to 45 degrees above the horizon. in this location there are 3 stars proximal to each other that form a slightly tilted triangle or pyramid. the star at the top of the triangle is slightly brighter than the other two. calling straight up from that star 12 o’clock, jupiter is in about 2:30 position and maybe another 20 degrees higher. i noticed a faint object above the star at the top of the triangle in about the 12:30 position and nearly equal distant from the top star as the other stars forming the triangle. at first it appeared to be stationary, then it shot south southeast at a very high rate of speed. initially it looked like a falling star because it trailed light behind it, but then it slowed and started to maneuver curving first to the left then to the right as it moved southerly till it faded out of sight. i knew instantly it was similar to the object i had seen september 27th of 2015; however, this is where it became different. in the same location that i first saw the phenomenon above the top star, after a minute or so, i saw another dim white lighted object appear. it also looked like a dim stationary star, but while looking at it for a second or two, it too shot off. this time the object moved to the northwest passing under jupiter at a very high rate of speed. it faded out of sight at about the 5:30 position relative to jupiter. at this point i ran to the house opened the front door and told my wife that the object from last september was back. her reaction to this was what i expected, so i shut the door and went back into the front yard and started watching the sky above the triangle of stars to the south. always from the same spot in the night sky, these objects appeared to be “born.” i watched maybe as many as twenty of these objects take off from the same location. they went in different directions, some appeared to maneuver and go in circles before shooting off at extremely fast rates of speed. others moved off slowly fading out of view in fairly straight trajectories. a high flying jet flew under one of the objects while i was watching it maneuver which convinced me that what i was witnessing was taking place in the upper atmosphere, if not higher.
when my next door neighbor came out of his house and called him over to me. i asked him how his eye sight was. i then explained to him what was happening and where to look. it didn’t take long for him to see one of these objects appear in the same location. fortunately it didn’t travel in a straight line and it too shot off at a high rate of speed to fade out of sight. now i had a fellow witness who just happens to be a fireman in our city of jenks. we watched several more of this phenomenon together. by now it was near 10:00 pm. his wife came out and after telling her what we were doing, she watched with us for a minute or two during which time nothing happened so they both went into their home. i watched another couple of minutes and saw one more of these things be born and shoot off. i went in doors and told my wife our neighbor paul wayne has seen several of these objects too, proving i wasn’t imaging things.

today, monday morning, march 29, 2016 at about 5:50 am, before getting into the mini-van to come to work, i scanned the sky looking for more of these objects.  the sky was clear, lots of stars and the moon over half-full was about where jupiter was the night before. i scanned the sky in the south where the birth place of these objects had been last evening and after looking for two or three minutes i saw nothing there. it was about this time i saw a satellite. it appeared over our house in the north and traveled to the south southwest at a steady rate of speed. it was very bright so i thought maybe it might have been the international space station. before it faded out of sight, i looked almost straight up and i saw one of the dim objects pop into view. it appeared stationary for an instant before it shot off to the south as fast as any falling star i had ever seen. the birthing location of these things had moved to almost directly over our house. i watched two more appear. one moved slowly off in a large arc to the southwest where it faded out of sight. the last one i saw before i had to leave for work stayed stationary for a moment then went extremely fast to the east and faded out of view.

to whom it may concern: 
these sightings are by definition a re-occurring phenomenon. i expect to be able to see these objects again as some point in the near future, maybe even tonight provided the skies are clear. my next door neighbor saw some of these objects too, so i am no longer the only one to have seen them. unfortunately i did not have binoculars or telescope to see the objects better, but i saw them well enough with my naked eyes to be able to post this sighting with confidence.
i have no clue as to what it was that my neighbor and i saw. i am hoping that mufon may have heard of something similar and could tell me what it was we were looking at. it would likely take special lenses and recording equipment to capture the birth and take-off of one of these objects on video. to a certainty, these objects are not falling stars or meteors because they can speed up, slow down and change direction. please advise me as to what i should do if when i witness one of these events in the future. 
dale alyea
content.summary: Meteor to satellite like but can change speed and direction in an instant. has occurred 3 seperate days - numerous objects but only appearing1 at a time in the upper atmosphere. on march 28th this phenomenon was observed by myself and a neighbor.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking pictures of french mountains with a friend, using long exposure time, on a small path close to the town, when i saw a strange light among the clouds. i first thought it was the moon but then i remembered it was a day of new moon.

besides, it was moving slowly, back and forth laterally. i was fascinated, i did not know what it could be at all, but it was beautiful, so i took a picture. it is a 10 seconds exposure so the object is blurry because of its motion. the light around it looked unreal, as if it was a very powerful but very far object, above the mountains. that is why i thought then it was an ufo. my friend was amazed too.

gradually, the light became dimmer, and the object vanished in the dark in a few seconds. all that remained were clouds. we got home.
content.summary: A big strange light appeared and disappeared slowly above the mountains

content.detailedDescription: Estaba en el techo de mi casa listo para filmar parapentistas ya que la montaña se usa como plataforma, enfoqué mi cámara de vídeo adaptada para ver en espectro infrarrojo, al hacer "zoom in" de 20x ópticos noté un objeto brillante estático muy cerca del pico de esta montaña llamada "butulu" después de unos segundos empieza a desplazarse hacia la izquierda y a elevarse, intento buscar un punto de referencia haciendo "zoom out" y casi lo pierdo pero como tenía el enfoque en modo "manual" logre ubicarlo nuevamente, el objeto acelera y trato de seguirlo hasta al entrar en una nube  lo pierdo.
content.summary: Objeto captado en la vega cundinamarca - colombia 26/03/2016 (jueves santo) sobre el cerro "butulu"

content.detailedDescription: I was outside having a smoke when i sean a bright pulsating light i looked at it for about 2 minutes then it took off away from me at a very high speed until it was gone(real fast).I belive it was some sort of spiritual intity.
content.summary: At first it looked like a close star,but was pulsating white light then took off very very quickly

content.detailedDescription: 1. back seat of a car on my way home. 2. i was just looking out the window for no reason. 3. at first i thought it was an airplane but when the car came to a stop and noticed it wasn't moving and had no wings. 4. it was cigar shaped and was white and stood still. 5. at first i wasn't worried but then i was very interested when i saw what it really was. 6. i stopped watching it and i didn't see it again.
content.summary: Was quiet and quick

content.detailedDescription:
I observed the first object, which appeared like a large, orange star, with a sort of aura of colour around a brighter core, as i was leaving a friend's house and getting into another friend's car with them. i noticed the object because just as i was about to turn the corner out of the driveway to the curb where we were parked, i felt a sort of 'pull' inside my head to look in the direction of the object, and saw the written words "look over there" 'in the front' of my mind (that's the best way i can describe it).

my friend noticed that i was looking at the object, but we didn't talk about it - ufos are not a subject that, at present, i feel i can discuss with them so easily, and i imagine that they probably thought it was just a plane. at the time, the object was simply hovering in the sky, but as we got into the car i continued to watch it, and it began to 'drift' (it was more like sliding, like an air hockey puck) to the right, from my perspective. its light remained constant as it did so.

as we turned onto the main road out of the residential area we were in, the orange object began to softly, gently pulsate, like a throbbing 'dimmer' then 'brighter' then 'dimmer', etc., and started to turn gradually paler in colour.

as we drove on our route back from east wittering to chichester, the object stopped moving again. about 3-4 minutes after my sighting of it had started, it had become white in colour and dimmer. it also flashed a few times, like the way lights flash on the bottom of planes. when it stopped flashing, a second object just like it, with the same dimness, and also white, faded into view 'beneath' it and to its right(from my perspective). it drifted slowly to the right the way the other one had before. about a minute later it had stopped moving and both objects were hovering in the sky, at a constant height and in one place.

my last sighting of the two objects was after we went round a bend in the road. i noticed that they were getting closer, and then our car passed them by (they were to the right of us). then my line of sight of them became blocked by trees. by that point, the second object had become red in colour, and the first was starting to turn back to its original orange colour.

this is not the first time that i've seen ufos of this type - i've also seen ufos of other types before as well, both in england and in new zealand, many times in the company of other eyewitnesses.

at the time of the sighting, particularly as we approached chichester, a few planes were visible in the sky, with their typical light configurations. i've seen countless planes, helicopters, sattelites, chinese lanterns, stars, planets, etc. in my lifetime, and they're very easy to distinguish from anomalous aerial phenomena such as the two objects i witnessed tonight.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two fireball/orb ufos in the sky above east wittering

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 1145-1150 am march 29th i was at home lying on a foam roller on my back with my head toward a large window. i heard a plane outside whose engine was whining/growling like it was doing some kind of acrobatic maneuvers. it sounded like a small personal aircraft. i listened to it for a few minutes before i leaned my head back over the foam roller and looked out the window upside down. i did not see the plane but noticed what i thought were two white birds the size of hawks chasing each other in the sky to the wnw just over a hill here in town. as i watched i noticed that they were orb shaped and either reflecting light or giving off light. one moment that looked dull, then they appeared to shine or illuminate. 

i jumped up onto my feet and ran out to the backyard. the sky was crystal clear. at first it took me a moment to find them again. this is when i noticed the small plane moving toward them to the w. they appeared to move from sw to ne like they were chasing each other dropping and gaining altitude quickly and doing loops. this is when i also noticed it seemed like they changed shape for a moment. again i thought that maybe they were just birds but they didn't look right.

this is when they seemed to pick up speed and chase each other off out of my line (behind the trees in my yard) of sight to the ne. i ran inside to grab my phone in hopes that i would see them again but nothing. the small plane did not give chase and seemed to act like the objects weren't there. it too continued to make groaning sounds from whatever maneuvers it was doing (out of sight) for a few more minutes then headed off toward a local small plane airport to the n.

i have  attached a photo of my view point which shows the flight path of the plane, the objects, and the flight path of some commercial airlines (though none appeared during the incident). i took the photo just after they went out of view and i ran inside to get my phone. total time of incident/sighting was probably 30 seconds?
content.summary: Crystal clear blue sky lying on my back noticed 2 objects thought were birds doing loops around each other.

content.detailedDescription: I had just arrived home around noon or so. i looked upward and saw an unusual white arc shaped formation in the north sky. i took the pic on my cell phone only because i've never seen a formation like it before. the pic was taken last summer (2015). i was flipping through my cell pictures to show my family the area where i lived. i thought there was a speck of dirt on my cell screen so i tried to scratch it off, (it didn't come off). so i zoomed in on the "speck" and noticed a metallic object near the arc shape. i need to tell you that i just noticed the object last week, the pic was taken last summer. to be honest, i have no idea what the object is. all i can say is that i never heard or saw the object when i took the picture. i wish that i had seen it when i took the pic, i could have zoomed in then and observed it. please let me know if you would be interested in seeing this pic. you have the technology to properly identify it.
content.summary: Matallic looking

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were traveling east through clearwater, kansas approximately around 8:00 p.M. when we noticed a very black object hovering above the power lines alongside a train track around 1966 or 1967. it had small windows and was lit up on inside. the three of us asked at the same time, "what is that"? the object then started to travel in the direction of our car, flew over the car and then hovered in front of the car closest to the passenger side. my brother had either stopped the car or it has stopped on it's own. there was a very bright yellow beam of light that was directed at the car and lit up the inside. we all sat very still and didn't move until i looked at my brother and said, " don't stare, just go!" about that time the yellow beam of light went out and a door in the bottom of the object closed, then the object took off at a 45 degree angle and dissipated into the air in about 3 seconds. the car started and we started traveling east on the rural road. we were all silent and i remember feeling angry, nauseated and upset at the incident. i didn't want to even think about it because it was so unpleasant. when we got home my mother called the air force base close to our home and they denied having any knowledge of anything. i am an elderly woman who has always wanted an explanation as to what this was but doubt that i will ever know. there were no cell phones to take pictures in those days.
content.summary: Sighted black object over powerline. object headed towards our car, hovered in front of the car and directed a yellow beam of light into our car. no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
Police investigation:  within minutes of receiving the ufo complaint at the washtenaw county sheriff’s dept, deputies mcfadden and fitzpatrick, car #34, were dispatched to the witness location, made contact with witness (a).  witness (a) advised that an unidentified object was presently located in the swamp to the rear of the residence and had been so located for approximately one-half hour.  witness (a) further related that the object had been observed to rise to an altitude of approximately 500 feet and then to return to the ground.  witness (a) stated that lights were observed upon the object and that the lighting turned from a blue-green to a brilliant red to yellow in coloring.  object had appeared to be having difficulty in getting off the ground.
	witness (a) and his son, witness (b), had watched the object for some time and then proceeded into the wood and swamps in an attempt to locate the object and to see what it was.  both witnesses were in the swamp when the deputies arrived.  the deputies, in company with witness (a), proceeded along dexter-pinckney rd to territorial rd, and then turned onto quigley rd, where a vantage point was obtained, being in direct line with the house (which no longer exists) and the area of the objects observation.  at this point the patrol vehicle was secured and the afore mentioned proceeded into the woods in an attempt to locate the swamp edge and the object.
while in the woods a brilliant light was observed from the far edge of the woods, upon approaching, the light dimmed in brilliance.  as the afore mentioned approached the upper ridge and the edge of the woods, the brilliant light again appeared and then disappeared.  a continued search of the area was conducted through the swamp and high grass with negative results.
	upon returning to the patrol vehicle they were met by others who had gathered to observe and the undersigned officers were informed that one of the objects had been hovering directly over the area where flashlight beams had been seen, and then departed in a west direction of flight at high rate of speed.  the deputies and witness (a) returned to the residence where further interviews were conducted.  
	during the subsequent interview, witness (a) stated that he had observed the lights coming from the swamp and had awakened his son, witness (b).  both witnesses then proceeded into the swamps in an attempt to find the object which was producing the light.  upon entering the lower edge of the swamp the son stated “what is that thing” and witness (a) looked in the direction indicated, the object was observed.  at the instant of observation the small lights went out, and in just an instant, reappeared across the swamp, a distance of about 500 yards.  at this time the object became illuminated from a brilliant source of light which flowed horizontal between the two (2) small lights.  after watching the object for a couple of minutes the rays of light from two flashlights were observed from the ridge above the object  the light from the object intensified then went out, and a whistle similar to the sound of a rifle bullet ricochet was heard, then the object passed directly over the witnesses in just an instant.
police disposition:  further investigation and search of the area was made with negative results.
respectfully submitted, deputies fitzpatrick/mcfadden
content.summary: Historical – dexter, mi-1966 swamp gas events:  strange object in the swamp at the end of our road. it was on the ground, went up in the air about 500 ft and came down making a lot of noise.

content.detailedDescription:
I was checking out the allskycam website last night and came across a strange object hovering in one spot flashing a series of sequences of light on what appeared to be light panels which were on the side of a cicular disc like craft. i watched it for several minutes and captured screen shots of the event before showing it to my husband to confirm i was seeing what thought i was seeing. it was truly an unidentified flying object. 

you asked how it made me feel. it actually was a blessing to me personally because last august i was walking my dog at about 10 pm and when i came around the corner of my house saw an object with the same lights about 2 miles back into the mountains. my house sits at about 9,000 feet backed up to truchas peaks. it was in the truchas peak region that i observed the craft that was identical to the one on the allskycam. it was awesome to be able to show my husband and then when he confirmed it was a ufo, to share that it was identical to what i saw over at the peaks in august 2015.
content.summary: I was observing the allskycam site for the first time last evening and was dumbfounded when i saw a series of bright lights hovering in the east sky on the hawaii cam. i have pictures

content.detailedDescription:
This took place the night of march 30th and early morning of march 31st.

i went to bed as usual and fell asleep quickly. it felt like a short time (but could have been longer), before i found myself awake in an area that wasn't my room. 

description of the room: the room was well lit, despite no obvious light sources. i noted that the walls and floor had a matte grey-blue colour, with some areas that were a white-grey. there was a counter in front of me with some black rod-like tools and needles, and some storage compartments in the walls (sort of resembling cabinets). i was sitting on a bed-like bench that was fused to the floor. the last thing about the room i noticed were these mechanical looking arm-like tools coming out of the ceiling of the room. i could not discern any entrance/exit-way from my vantage point.

***

after i awoke i felt incredibly groggy and hazy, like i was dealing with a sedative. i looked up from where i was sitting to see a young man. he was facing away from me preparing something on the counter. he wore a skin-tight blue jumpsuit with a black belt around the waist, and he wore black boots. he had short light blonde hair.

i called out to him saying "hello there", which got his attention. he turned from what he was doing and said "hello", i wasn't surprised that he could speak english. i introduced myself to him, afterwards he responded saying that i already knew him, but it was ok if i didn't remember. i noticed his eyes as he drew closer to talk to me, they were a light grey-blue with vertical slit pupils. i wasn't bothered by his eyes, i was honestly quite intrigued with them. for some reason i decided to ask about him. i asked him where he was from, and he responded "around the area of antares". after conversing with him, he told me that he had to do some work on me, and that what he would do will sting a bit, but he would try his best not to make it hurt.

he returned to the counter and grabbed a small white sheet with many holes in it, and placed it on my exposed back. it stuck there, between my right shoulder and my spine. after placing the sheet on my back he grabbed this device with several small needles that matched up with the holes in the device and poked my back through the sheet. it stung when the device was inserted, but the procedure was quick. he returned to the counter and observed the sheet as certain areas changed to a certain colour, and left it on the counter for later.

he came up to me and told me that what he will do next may hurt but is necessary for me. he grabbed a mechanical arm from the ceiling and brought it towards where i was seated. he gently took my left hand with his and held it so my index finger and thumb were spread. grabbing the mechanical arm, the black head of it changed shape to form two long needles, about 1cm apart. he told me once again that he was sorry if this will hurt, and that it will sting. i watched as the two needles entered the space between my index finger and thumb. seconds after the device being in my hand, i felt something similar to an electric shock after it was removed from my hand. two reddish pink bumps rose from my hand where the needles were inserted. he released my hand and left me to go back to the counter. just as i was about to ask what the needle in my hand was for, my grogginess got the best of me and i blacked out.

i awoke in my bed feeling very heavy and with a slight headache. i was surprised to see the two raised bumps on my left hand after waking. they were numb to the touch and stung. they stayed on my hand for 2 weeks before disappearing.
content.summary: Awoke in craft where nordic-type entity worked with me. awoke with mark on hand following procedure.

content.detailedDescription: I'm john william a from coimbatore south in tamil nadu state and india country. i'm work as a faculty for electrical. when my work finished i'm return to my in my two wheeler my home was near to hills. suddenly i'm see a triangular shape object with white and blue bright light with high speed i try to stop my vehicle before it cross the area the direction is south west to west direction. the time is night 8.38pm sight timing only approx 5 to 6 second.
content.summary: That object was triangular shape with white and blue bright light with very fast at straight line cross approx 1km to 1mile and disappear back the hill. when i'm see this return to my home from east to west road.

content.detailedDescription: Well i was in the front yeard.I stard walking to go in side but be for i got to the door something in my head told me look up.So that's when i did and i see the light it was moving slow  like 1 min then just turn off i was not scare i was happy to fanaly have my proff. it was yellow like the size of a basketball but it was a light.
content.summary: Like a light.Then  like some one then turn it off..

content.detailedDescription: Driving home crossing the kam river bridge and to my right my eyes seen some lights that are very low for a plane or helicopter right in the river vally there was 5 brite lights in a cluster moving very slow to almost not moving i had to look a few times to comprehend what i was seeing when i realized what i was seeing i stopped my truck took out my phone and fumbled with that and got out and took some pictures just before they went different ways it seemed like they changed forms have pictures of them shaped like the moon on the out house on one of them and then they took off at speeds unknown to us hope this helps out. this all took place just before it was dusk so i seen this very well. ps there also was cars driving by i don't know if they looked up but it was pretty hard to miss this.
content.summary: Un belivable hard to take in

content.detailedDescription: I was in aventura, fl waiting for my school bus to pick me up. i saw my bus approaching and above my bus i saw really bright lights.At first, i thought it was a plane but, i then noticed it had way too many light for it to be a plane.When i look up and it was a "movie like spaceship". was about the size of 5 airplanes in diameter. most enormous object i've seen in the sky, had about 10 or more lights and was descending when i saw it. there was on friend next to me when i saw it. we both turned to each pther and said, "did you see that". we were both very confused and excited to what we had just witnessed. after about five seconds of seeing this object, it just vanished as if nothing were even there.
content.summary: Movie like ship, had various lights. within 5 seconds, lights and object disappered.

content.detailedDescription: Not sure if this is where to report it but about an hour ago i was in mh back yard looking at the stars with my dog and saw a triangular ufo with at least 4 lights in cayce sc.  the lights were kind of hard to make out like when you see a bright star then look at it straight on and it sort of disappears but not all the way. it aas flying away and seemed pretty far. only saw it for maybe 30 seconds but i freaked out and ran out front and my dog was crying in the back but probably he jusg knew i qas emotional but he acted cery calm and after i went back and kept sitting like ive been trying to train him to and there were lofs of sounds all around me but probably i was just really freaked out over it all but yeah i definitely saw it that part was real maybe the stuff after was in my head cause ya know. it was silent and was jusg going. it didnt rotate at all just went and i guess it did seem fast for how far it must have been but im not sure.  i was awed at first then excited then i was pretty scared for a minute but mostly excited i stayed outside looking up for a while and might have seen something else like a fire ball but probbly just a shooting star i was pretty freaked out and kept thinking there was something in my yard with me and my dog was sniffing in afew directions once i got him to come to me it seemed like he was being really obedient but not to me because i was trying to get him to come protect me or something i dont know i just didnt want to be alone is something happened
content.summary: I was in mh back yard looking at the stars with my dog and saw a triangular ufo with at least 4 lights in cayce sc.  the lights were kind of hard to make out like when you see a bright star then
